name: Creatures Selsulec (DEMO)
description:
In this game, you play as a character named Alan on his quest to take down all of the passing challengers and become the champion of creature trainers! You'll meet exciting new challenges and great new friends in this new upcoming game, Creatures Selsulec! (If there are any bugs or glitches, let me know! I will try to fix them in the full release.)

Arrow keys or WASD to move, hold space to run, and e to interact/continue text.

Art - Me

Music - AdventureMase, Me, UncleHammy, AbuffZucchini, Moodle, Meekaryo, catlover12136, cs3034703
